survey_name: Parental Satisfaction with Childcare Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from parents regarding their satisfaction levels with local childcare services, focusing on quality of care, communication, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of care provided by your childcare service?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard Likert scale for consistency and easy analysis. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly with clearly labeled buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of care provided by your childcare service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following aspects of the childcare service do you value the most? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse parental priorities. Ensure checkboxes are clearly spaced for mobile users.

script.question_text: Which of the following aspects of the childcare service do you value the most? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you communicate with the childcare providers about your child's progress?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to quantify communication patterns. Ensure the options are exhaustive and mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you communicate with the childcare providers about your child's progress?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your childcare service?
questions.client_notes: Provide an open-ended text box to capture qualitative feedback. Use a larger input field for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your childcare service?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this childcare service to other parents?
questions.client_notes: Include a neutral option to avoid forced responses. Use clear, concise wording.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this childcare service to other parents?
